Similarly, Daniel is an ancestor of Kenneth through Daniel → Emma → Maria → Randy → Nicole → Samantha → Mason → Timothy → Jordan → Douglas → Lauren → Cheryl → Sean → Alexander → Janet → Dorothy → Ronald → Joshua → Billy → Bruce → Denise → Patricia → Christine → Frank → Sharon → Dylan → Helen → Hannah → Nathan → Vincent → Brian → Anna → Shirley → Rebecca → Debra → Joseph → Kimberly → Andrea → Elijah → Ethan → Judy → Sarah → Mary → Charles → Angela → Andrew → Thomas → Paul → Charlotte → Michael → Jacqueline → Roger → Rachel → Grace → Joyce → Kathleen → Joan → Jonathan → Christian → Linda → Philip → Emily → Sara → Lori → Keith → Ashley → Carol → Michelle → Madison → Gary → Pamela → Russell → Adam → Diane → Kenneth.
